as there are sites where anonymous hackers upload pattern files containing viruses allowing them to access your computer and steal your personal and financial details @lollyscc #weebeedolls #weebeepocketpaige click here to join the weebee appreciation society #crochetdollpattern facebook group dedicated to the weebee doll patterns #amigurumi before you begin… when i make my weebee pocket paige doll find the doll pattern here using worsted /4/aran/10ply weight yarn and a 3mm hook they stand at 4 inches tall made from the toes to the top of the head in one go only the arms need sewing or crocheting on other yarn weights and hook sizes can of course be used to create a smaller or a larger dolls the weebee dolls are named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since you can find all of my doll patterns plus lots of hair and clothing/outfit patterns here useful info for those who crochet left handed please take a look at this site for hints and tips about following crochet patterns if you are left handed which yarns did i use for my doll and clothing not a recommendation as such it s just because i get asked this a lot we don t have much choice here in the uk yarn wise stylecraft special and paintbox acrylic yarn are my absolute favourite brands though lovely to work with and reasonably priced ☺ terminology us abbreviations abbreviations cont/d… chain chain single_crochet single_crochet other items needed double_crochet double_crochet space space stitch marker half_double_crochet half_double_crochet skip skp tapestry needle loop lp stitch st stuffing magic_ring magic_ring slip_stitch slip_stitch pair of 10mm safety eyes with next nxt yarn over yo pupils round round special stitches twisted single_crochet tw single_crochet insert hook into st yo pull through a loop 2 loops on hook make them loose rotate the hook towards yourself counter clockwise and all the way around 360 degrees yo and draw through two loops on hook click here for a video which shows how to do it if you are right handed and
